name: Soju and Tonic With Lemon-Lime Syrup
description: Tonic's not just for gin: It makes for a refreshing highball with soju, too — and a judicious measure of citrusy syrup sweetens it up just enough.
recipeIngredient: Tonic water (I like Q Tonic for this, or Schweppes)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add syrup, then soju, then tonic to fill. Give the drink a gentle stir. Garnish with lemon peel.
